subject: Re: [cc-community] CC BY SA music on TempoStand
body:
It is similar yes, but we provide a sort of incubation to the upcoming musicians. We take some risk in recording their music etc. We intend to become an online music label. :)Ujjwal
On 6/3/07, RalfGesellensetter <rgx@gmx.de> wrote:
Am Mittwoch 30 Mai 2007 00:10 schrieb Ujjwal Grover:> We have recently launched our online music portal called> TempoStand<http://www.tempost> 
and.com/>.Hi & thanks for your information. Does it compare to jamendo.com andwhat are the differences?RegardsRalf_______________________________________________
